010package imagingbook.pub.dft.obsolete;
011
012import imagingbook.lib.math.Complex;
013
014@Deprecated
015public class Dft1d {
016
017        double[] cosTable;
018        double[] sinTable;
019        Complex[] G;                    // TODO: clean up creation of G (made instances of Complex immutable)!
020        
021        Dft1d(int M){ //Constructor
022                makeCosTable(M);
023                makeSinTable(M);
024                G = new Complex[M];     //this is done only ONCE when object is created!
025                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
026                        G[i] = new Complex(0,0);
027                }
028        }
029        
030        void makeCosTable(int M){
031                cosTable = new double[M];
032                for (int i=0; i<M; i++){
033                        cosTable[i]= Math.cos(2*Math.PI*i/M);
034                }
035        }
036        
037        void makeSinTable(int M){
038                sinTable = new double[M];
039                for (int i=0; i<M; i++){
040                        sinTable[i]= Math.sin(2*Math.PI*i/M);
041                }               
042        }
043        
044        public Complex[] DFT(Complex[] g, boolean forward) {
045                int M = g.length;
046                double s = 1 / Math.sqrt(M); //common scale factor
047                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
048                        double sumRe = 0;
049                        double sumIm = 0;
050                        for (int m = 0; m < M; m++) {
051                                double gRe = g[m].re;
052                                double gIm = g[m].im;
053                                int k = (u * m) % M;
054                                double cosPhi = cosTable[k];
055                                double sinPhi = sinTable[k];
056                                if (forward)
057                                        sinPhi = -sinPhi;
058                                //complex multiplication: (gRe + i gIm) * (cosPhi + i sinPhi)
059                                sumRe += gRe * cosPhi - gIm * sinPhi;
060                                sumIm += gRe * sinPhi + gIm * cosPhi;
061                        }
062//                      G[u].re = s * sumRe;    
063//                      G[u].im = s * sumIm;
064                        G[u] = new Complex(s * sumRe, s * sumIm);
065                }
066                return G;
067        }
068}
